statement.name: findRandomTracks
statement.sql: SELECT random() AS rnd, {trackColumns}, COUNT(i.track_id) AS imagecount FROM track t LEFT OUTER JOIN image i ON i.track_id = t.id WHERE :sourcePlaylistId IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM link_track_playlist ltp WHERE ltp.track_id = t.id AND ltp.playlist_id = :sourcePlaylistId) GROUP BY rnd, {groupByTrackColumns} ORDER BY rnd LIMIT :maxCount OFFSET 0

statement.name: findRandomTracksRestricted
statement.sql: SELECT random() AS rnd, {trackColumns}, COUNT(i.track_id) AS imagecount FROM link_track_playlist rltp, track t LEFT OUTER JOIN image i ON i.track_id = t.id WHERE (:sourcePlaylistId IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM link_track_playlist ltp WHERE ltp.track_id = t.id AND ltp.playlist_id = :sourcePlaylistId)) AND rltp.playlist_id = :restrictedPlaylistId AND t.id = rltp.track_id GROUP BY rnd, {groupByTrackColumns} ORDER BY rnd LIMIT :maxCount OFFSET 0

statement.name: findAlbumImage
statement.sql: SELECT data AS data FROM image i, track t WHERE t.album = :album AND i.track_id = t.id AND i.size = :size LIMIT 1 OFFSET 0

statement.name: nextPlaylistId
statement.sql: SELECT nextval('playlist_id_sequence') AS id FROM system_information
